ko.leaveTomorrow: 📅 내일은 연차/휴일 예정일입니다. 자동 출퇴근이 실행되지 않습니다.
ko.jobcanTaskSkippedLeave: 🏖️ 오늘은 연차/휴일이므로 Jobcan {{taskType}} 작업이 실행되지 않았습니다. (사용자: {{username}})
ko.onLeaveSkippedCheckIn: 🏖️ 오늘은 연차/휴일이므로 자동 출근이 실행되지 않았습니다. (날짜: {{date}}, 사용자: {{username}})
ko.onLeaveSkippedCheckOut: 🏖️ 오늘은 연차/휴일이므로 자동 퇴근이 실행되지 않았습니다. (날짜: {{date}}, 사용자: {{username}})

en.leaveTomorrow: 📅 Tomorrow is a scheduled day off. Automated clock-in/out will be skipped.
en.jobcanTaskScheduled: ⏰ Jobcan {{taskType}} task has been scheduled for {{time}}. (User: {{username}})
en.jobcanTaskCancelled: 🚫 Jobcan {{taskType}} task schedule has been cancelled. (User: {{username}})
en.jobcanTaskSkippedLeave: 🏖️ Today is a scheduled day off, so Jobcan {{taskType}} task was not executed. (User: {{username}})
en.onLeaveSkippedCheckIn: 🏖️ Automated check-in was skipped today due to scheduled leave. (Date: {{date}}, User: {{username}})
en.onLeaveSkippedCheckOut: 🏖️ Automated check-out was skipped today due to scheduled leave. (Date: {{date}}, User: {{username}})
